servinfo.title: A/C Refrigerant Pressure Sensor Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Recover refrigerant from the A/C system with the recovery and recycling equipment referring to “Recovery” in Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant .
Disconnect A/C refrigerant pressure sensor connector.
Remove A/C refrigerant pressure sensor (1) from liquid pipe (2).

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: A/C Refrigerant Pressure Sensor and Its Circuit Inspection

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure noting the following instructions.

item.ptxt: Apply compressor oil to O-ring of A/C refrigerant pressure sensor.
Tighten A/C refrigerant pressure sensor (1) to specified torque.
Evacuate and charge the A/C system referring to “Evacuation” and “Charge” in Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant .
